name: Daily Grind - Coffee Porter 7% ABV
description: Cold conditioned on a hefty dose of ColombiaDulima Excelso from our friends at Valiant Coffee Roasters. Served on nitro for maximum creamy goodness.

name: Cold Grind - American Lager 4.5% ABV
description:
Clean. Crisp. Uncompromising.

Cold Grind is a no-nonsense premium lager brewed for those who respect the grind. Crafted with precision and patience, it pours a brilliant golden hue with a frothy white head. Expect a light, bready malt backbone balanced by a subtle hop bitterness and a refreshingly dry finish. Cold-fermented and conditioned for extra smoothness, its the perfect beer for unwinding after a hard dayor gearing up for the next challenge.

name: Velvet Funeral - Barrel-Aged Stout 16.1% ABV
description: Aged gracefully for 18 months in a combination of Blanton's and Buffalo Trace barrels.

name: Micro Blaster - Session IPA 5% ABV
description:
Blurring the lines of Session IPA and Pale Ale, this absolute hop crusher gets blasted with powerful charges of Nelson, Mosaic, and Simcoe. Punchy notes of blueberry forest, rock fruit, and southern hemi diesel.

2025 World Beer Cup - Gold Medal - Session India Pale Ale

2024 World Beer Cup - Gold Medal - Session India Pale Ale

2023 GABF - Bronze Medal - Session India Pale Ale

name: Cosmic Swirl - Hazy IPA 7.2% ABV
description: Embark on a galactic journey with Cosmic Swirl, a bold and vibrant hazy IPA. Bursting with the interstellar flavors of Citra and Nectaron hops, this beer delivers a lush swirl of juicy citrus, tropical fruit, and cosmic haze. At 7.2% ABV, its a celestial experiencesoft, smooth, and packed with flavorperfect for when youre ready to get lost in the stars

name: Zero Degrees - Cold IPA 6.5% ABV
description:
100% Mosaic and Mosaic Cryo hops bring you vibrant flavors and aromas of blueberry fields, mango flesh, and top shelf herb.

2024 GABF - Silver Medal - American-Style Strong Pale Ale

2023 GABF - Bronze Medal - India Pale Lager or Cold India Pale Ale

name: Shred IPA - West Coast IPA 6.5 % ABV
description:
Introducing simply - Shred IPA

We carefully selected a blend of Mosaic, Citra, Simcoe, and CTZ hops to showcase intense hoppy deliciousness over a lean malt canvas. Bright tropical fruits paired with dank cannabis notes shine through on the palate for a most excellent sensory experience

name: Good Buds - West Coast IPA 7% ABV
description:
Pop, pour, and pass it to your left. This West Coast IPA hits with sticky pine, bright citrus, and that dank snap of bitternessloaded with Simcoe, Apollo, Amarillo & Chinook hops.

Whether youre blazing trails or just blazing, this ones for the real ones.â€¨

Pairs with your couch, your crew & a good sesh.

name: Hand Picked - Hazy IPA 6.5% ABV
description: Bursting with hand-selected Citra, Simcoe, and El Dorado hops- this beer drips with an abundance of peach nectar, rock fruit, and honeydew flesh.

name: Spent Greens - Fresh Hop IPA 6.7% ABV
description:
Celebrate the harvest This is our annual tribute to the most exciting time of year in the world of hops.

We started with a massive dose of fresh-picked Centennial hops, rushed straight off the bines from the fine folks at Crosby Hops.

We then built upon that vibrant, green foundation with a high-stakes dry hop of Simcoe, Nelson, and Nectaron. The result is a West Coast IPA that bridges the Pacific Northwest and the Southern Hemispherea wild symphony of wet pine and lemon meringue from the fresh Centennials, layered with the dank, stone fruit of Simcoe, the diesel notes of Nelson, and the explosive tropical passion fruit of Nectaron.

name: Murk Level Midnight - Hazy DIPA 8.5% ABV
description:
Hazy DIPA collaboration with our pals at Pure Project Brewing.

Prepare to get totally murked out from an abundance of Nelson, Strata, Citra, and Simcoe hops.

Tasting notes Pineapple Sorbet. Peach Rings. Fresh Herbs.

name: Macro Blaster - West Coast DIPA 9% ABV
description:
We took our super crushable award-winning Micro Blaster and amplified it up to another level

Lock and load with Macro Blaster DIPA, the ultimate hop cannon designed to blast your senses into overdrive Like the wildest water gun fight on the block, this brew comes charging with Mosaic, Mosaic Cryo, Mosaic DynaBoost, Nelson, Nelson Cryo, Simcoe, & Simcoe Cryo.

Soaked and saturated with flavors and aromas of crushed gooseberries, resin sauce, and pineapple gelato.

name: Training Wheels - Hazy IPA 7% ABV
description:
Brewed with copious amounts oats and spelt, then hopped intensely with Citra Cryo, Citra, and Strata hops.

Apricot Sorbet. Dole Whip. Sativa Flowers.
